title: 15 Best Shoe Racks and Organizers for Decluttering in 2025
author: Lauren Arzbaecher
excerpt: Looking for the best shoe racks and storage solutions? We’ve rounded up 16 stylish options that will declutter your space without being an eyesore
text: Unlike most over-the-door organizers that are fully constructed from fabric, Arzbaecher appreciates the PVC on this option because she finds that it's easier to wipe clean. “When looking for a way to store shoes with a hanging organizer, I wanted a solid barrier to prevent any dirt that might get stuck in shoe treads from getting onto my wardrobe,” she said. “The clear plastic protects both my shoes and clothes, and is simple to clean with a damp cloth.” If you’re blessed with a big closet, deeper options like this one with different-size compartments easily fit purses, winter hats, toiletries, almost anything. With the help of your closet door, the world is your organizing oyster!Dimensions: 68.5"H x 24.5"W x ‎2"DMaterial: Clear PVC, black fabric pipingColors: Clear and blackCapacity: Fits 20 pairs, 4 for smaller shoesMultipurpose functionalityDoesn’t take up additional floor spaceEasy to wipe cleanHeels and larger shoes may not fitBest Under-Bed Shoe Storage: Iris Under Bed DrawerIris Under Bed DrawerBeyond shoes, these are great for all parts your wardrobe. Arzbaecher uses a second drawer for storing sweaters during the summer. Swapping out your footwear based on the season is a strategic way to prevent clutter in your space. After all, no one needs sandals laying around during the wintertime! When the seasons change, your seasonal shoes will be easy to grab from under the bed with this handy plastic pull-out drawer. In contrast to most under-bed bins that have a removable lid, this is instead built as a drawer but maintains the same dust-free protection.“As someone who plays a kind of storage Tetris under her bed, I love that I don’t have to lug this bin out to open it and can instead just pull the drawer open and grab what I need,” Arzbaecher notes. For lofted beds or bed frames with more open space underneath, these drawers are stackable and come in multipacks and wide sizes as well.Dimensions: 5.87"H x 17.375"W x 29.125"DMaterial: PlasticColors: ClearCapacity: Holds up to 20 pairs, dependent on sizeEasy accessDoesn’t take up additional floor spaceQuick to wipe cleanSometimes slide around on the floor when pulling the drawer openNot ideal for heels and other taller shoesBest shoe storage bench: HomePop Velvet Upholstered Storage BenchHomePop Velvet Upholstered Storage BenchEven tall boots fit easily inside this adorable bench. Want stylish seating for your entryway? That’s exactly what Arzbaecher had in mind when she scooped up this eye-catching bench. “This curbed my aesthetic craving for a green velvet piece of furniture and helped to declutter my space,” she said. A storage bench provides a place to sit to take shoes on and off in addition to interior storage for your footwear. Unlike a typical entryway rack, storage benches also keep your shoes fully hidden. The hinged lid and cushioned seat of this green velvet option make it a comfortable place to land near your front door. For an even more luxe look, try bouclé or leather options.Dimensions: 17.5"H x 32"W x 16.5"DMaterial: Powder-coated metal, velvetColors: GreenCapacity: Holds up to five pairs, dependent on sizeDual purpose as seatingShoes are completely hidden insideSmaller capacityDifficult to clean10 Other Stylish Shoe Organizers We RecommendThe Container Store Tiered Metal RackThe Container Store Tiered Metal RackDevoting a lot of room to shoe storage can feel like a waste of floor space. After all, that spot could be used for more energizing things, like a colorful accent chair or a new piece of artwork. A portable shoe rack offers organization solutions when you have guests over, when the winter makes you bust out extra pairs of boots, or when you just need some extra storage. This simple but effective option from organization mecca The Container Store is sturdy enough to hold up to 75 pounds, so you can stash things beyond footwear.Dimensions: 25.875"H x 24"W x 12"DMaterial: Powder-coated steelColors: Black, white, juniperCapacity: Holds up to 6 pairs, supports up to 75 lbs.Carrying handle for easy portabilityMinimalist styleHolds more weight than other stylesNo edges on the sides, so shoes may slide off when rack is movedTangier Boot Tray by Larry TraversoTangier Boot Tray by Larry TraversoWinter is here, and with it comes snow and slush being tracked into the house. With a raised lip to prevent any water or debris from spilling out, a boot tray helps to prevent your entryway or mud room from getting, well, muddy. Reminiscent of tin-tiled ceilings from the late 1800s to early 1900s, the pattern on this metal tray is a step above the boring black rubber options that flood store shelves. Outside of winter, this is a wonderful option for gardening tools, pet accessories, or rain boots.Dimensions: 2"H x 30"W x 13'D'Material: Galvanized ironColors: Antique copper, turquoiseCapacity: Holds up to 3 pairsRaised lip keeps water/snow/slush containedWater resistantEasy to cleanDoesn’t hold many pairsAllModern Seagrass Storage BasketAllModern Seagrass Storage Basket (Set of 2)Storage baskets can get typecast as laundry hampers, but their usage is much more utilitarian. These big seagrass beauties provide nearly endless space to toss in shoes, and their included lids keep clutter out of sight. Cutout handles on the side offer portability should you want to swap out your seasonal footwear when the weather changes. We admit storing shoes in a basket may result in some digging around for both sides of a pair, but is a neat way to house a lot of shoes without worrying about running out of space.Dimensions: Small: 23"H x 16"W x 16"D, Large: 24"H x 18"W x 18"DMaterial: Seagrass, water hyacinthColors: Dark brown, naturalCapacity: Large holds up to 25 pairs, dependent on sizeDual purpose as laundry hamperShoes are completely hidden insideComes as a matching setNo interior organizationMay trap smells insideIKEA STÄLL Shoe CabinetIKEA STÄLL Shoe CabinetOdds are, if you’ve been searching for new shoe storage solutions, you’ve seen this best-selling IKEA shoe cabinet before. Popular in apartments for its narrow footprint and thoughtful tilt-out design, it’s incredibly functional for small spaces. A three-compartment version is also available for slimmer spots. The base unit is great on its own for minimalist decor, but if you want something more customized to your style, there are countless DIY hack TikToks focused on the Ställ to make it your own with new drawer pulls, added tabletops, and more.Dimensions: 35.375"H x 37.75"W x 6.75"DMaterial: Particleboard, birch wood, plastic edgingColors: White, oak, blackCapacity: Holds up to 12 pairsGreat for narrow spacesEasy to cleanLengthy assembly process17 Stories Vertical Shoe RackShoe Rack by 17 StoriesOnly have a small amount of space to work with? Explore vertical space with a shoe tower, made to fit even in the narrowest areas. Two larger shelves on the bottom and six smaller upper shelves make room for shoes of all sizes, from heels and sneakers. Tidy up your entryway even further by hanging purses, umbrellas, and keys using the double-tiered hooks on the sides. Mirroring the look of a vertical bookcase, this would be right at home holding your favorite paperbacks, plants, and other knickknacks in addition to your kicks. If you need an even smaller footprint, this compact Yamazaki vertical shoe rack holds five pairs and has a convenient carrying handle similar to the viral Open Spaces rack.Dimensions: 44.5"H x 11"W x 11"DMaterial: ParticleboardColors: Black, brown, whiteCapacity: Holds up to eight pairsGreat for narrow spacesCan double as a bookshelfEasy to cleanMore prone to tippingUSM Haller CredenzaUSM Haller CredenzaThis credenza isn’t technically meant for shoes, but with the sharp design and candy-coated color, we couldn’t help but include it. Architect Fritz Haller’s work inspires USM’s modular furniture, whose chrome-coated frames play right into this years’ design trends. The steel pieces are built to last for generations, making them worth the splurge. The open bottom shelf is tall enough to accommodate even mid-calf height boots, and the two drawers are just as spacious. To achieve the same eye-catching look in a smaller size and lower price point, go for the P2 Bedside Table, which made our list for the best nightstands.Dimensions: 29"H x 60"W x 15" DMaterials: Chromed steel frame, powder-coated steel panelsColors: Green, golden yellow, anthracite, beige, black, steel blue, white, gentian blueCapacity: Holds up to 10 pairs, dependent on sizeDual purpose as a credenzaTall open storageDurable designExpensiveUrban Outfitters Wall-Mounted WardrobeUrban Outfitters Wall-Mounted WardrobeA nice pair of shoes are nothing without an outfit to go with them. This rack has a rod for clothing hangers and three shelves for all your shoes and accessories. If you have a small closet, this is a great way to double up on storage space for your wardrobe. The wall-mounted design will keep it secure even as you regularly pull things on and off. An oval door disguises an interior set of shelves, topped off with a full-size mirror to check your look before you leave the house.Dimensions: 68.9"H x 47.48"W x 13.27"DMaterials: Wood, metalColors: BrownCapacity: Holds up to 10 pairs, dependent on utilizationDual purpose as wardrobeMirror for checking your outfitsWall mounted for stabilityPriceyComplex assemblyLoll Designs Cubby BenchLoll Designs Cubby BenchNeed a place to stash your kids’ shoes? This low-profile cubby bench is a handy addition to a mudroom or entryway. Coming in 13 different colors, go with a muted option to blend in with your home decor or a bright one to help get the little ones excited about putting things away. Beyond shoes, the two large slots in the center are large enough to fit tall boots, backpacks, or anything else they might need for school. What’s more, Loll Designs manufactures all its pieces from 100% recycled plastic sheet material, making it waterproof, durable, and easy to clean.Dimensions: 17.25"H x 44"W x 15"DMaterials: Recycled high-density polyethylene plasticColors: Black, chili, driftwood, fog, leaf, navy blue, red, sage, slate, sky blue, sunset orange, white, ash blueCapacity: Holds up to 10 pairsDual purpose as benchTall slots to fit large bootsDurable constructionPriceySSWBasics Wire Grid PanelSSWBasics Wire Grid PanelPumps and platforms can be difficult to store with their tall profile, unless you think outside the (shoe) box. Using a metal grid is a shockingly effective alternative storage option to the typical shoe rack. Leaned up against a wall, you can slot heels into the holes of the grid and hang a large number of shoes with ease. Plus the geometric pattern blends effortlessly into many decor styles.Dimensions: 4"H x 2"WMaterials: MetalColors: BlackCapacity: Holds up to 20 heels, dependent on sizeSlots fit a wide array of heel sizesMinimalist designNo assembly requiredCan’t hold non-heeled shoesThe Container Store Drop-Front Shoe BoxDrop-Front Shoe Box By The Container StoreYou might not have the idyllic walk-in sneaker closet of Lil Baby (at least yet), but these are a close second for any sneakerheads. Clear fronts let you proudly display all your kicks without having to guess where your favorite pair is. The hinged door on each box allows easy access while keeping shoes protected from dust buildup. They also include ventilation holes to keep funky smells at bay. Endlessly stackable, you can keep adding more in the three available sizes as your shoe collection grows.Dimensions: Small: 6.375"H x 8"W x 12"D; Large: 6.5"H x 10.25"W x 13.625"D; Extra Large: 7.75"H x 11"W x 15"DMaterials: Polypropylene, polystyreneColors: Black, gray, clearCapacity: Holds one pairStackableHigh visibility of shoesGreat dust protectionHave to buy individuallyHow We Chose These Shoe RacksFrom metal shoe racks to stackable bins, our team tried out five top shoe storage options and cataloged their favorites after several weeks of testing. We also rounded up storage benches, shoe storage cabinets, and other organization ideas that are effective for just about every type of shoe. During our review process, we analyzed ease of use, cleanliness, and how different pairs of shoes fit within them. Beyond functionality, we considered how these otherwise innocuous pieces of furniture can visually define an entryway, closet, or living room.
html:
Unlike most over-the-door organizers that are fully constructed from fabric, Arzbaecher appreciates the PVC on this option because she finds that it's easier to wipe clean. “When looking for a way to store shoes with a hanging organizer, I wanted a solid barrier to prevent any dirt that might get stuck in shoe treads from getting onto my wardrobe,” she said. “The clear plastic protects both my shoes and clothes, and is simple to clean with a damp cloth.” If you’re blessed with a big closet, deeper options like this one with different-size compartments easily fit purses, winter hats, toiletries, almost anything. With the help of your closet door, the world is your organizing oyster!

  • Dimensions: 68.5"H x 24.5"W x ‎2"D
  • Material: Clear PVC, black fabric piping
  • Colors: Clear and black
  • Capacity: Fits 20 pairs, 4 for smaller shoes
  • Multipurpose functionality
  • Doesn’t take up additional floor space
  • Easy to wipe clean
  • Heels and larger shoes may not fit

Best Under-Bed Shoe Storage: Iris Under Bed Drawer

Iris Under Bed Drawer

Swapping out your footwear based on the season is a strategic way to prevent clutter in your space. After all, no one needs sandals laying around during the wintertime! When the seasons change, your seasonal shoes will be easy to grab from under the bed with this handy plastic pull-out drawer. In contrast to most under-bed bins that have a removable lid, this is instead built as a drawer but maintains the same dust-free protection.

“As someone who plays a kind of storage Tetris under her bed, I love that I don’t have to lug this bin out to open it and can instead just pull the drawer open and grab what I need,” Arzbaecher notes. For lofted beds or bed frames with more open space underneath, these drawers are stackable and come in multipacks and wide sizes as well.

  • Dimensions: 5.87"H x 17.375"W x 29.125"D
  • Material: Plastic
  • Colors: Clear
  • Capacity: Holds up to 20 pairs, dependent on size
  • Easy access
  • Doesn’t take up additional floor space
  • Quick to wipe clean
  • Sometimes slide around on the floor when pulling the drawer open
  • Not ideal for heels and other taller shoes

Best shoe storage bench: HomePop Velvet Upholstered Storage Bench

HomePop Velvet Upholstered Storage Bench

Want stylish seating for your entryway? That’s exactly what Arzbaecher had in mind when she scooped up this eye-catching bench. “This curbed my aesthetic craving for a green velvet piece of furniture and helped to declutter my space,” she said. A storage bench provides a place to sit to take shoes on and off in addition to interior storage for your footwear. Unlike a typical entryway rack, storage benches also keep your shoes fully hidden. The hinged lid and cushioned seat of this green velvet option make it a comfortable place to land near your front door. For an even more luxe look, try bouclé or leather options.

  • Dimensions: 17.5"H x 32"W x 16.5"D
  • Material: Powder-coated metal, velvet
  • Colors: Green
  • Capacity: Holds up to five pairs, dependent on size
  • Dual purpose as seating
  • Shoes are completely hidden inside
  • Smaller capacity
  • Difficult to clean

10 Other Stylish Shoe Organizers We Recommend

The Container Store Tiered Metal Rack

The Container Store Tiered Metal Rack

Devoting a lot of room to shoe storage can feel like a waste of floor space. After all, that spot could be used for more energizing things, like a colorful accent chair or a new piece of artwork. A portable shoe rack offers organization solutions when you have guests over, when the winter makes you bust out extra pairs of boots, or when you just need some extra storage. This simple but effective option from organization mecca The Container Store is sturdy enough to hold up to 75 pounds, so you can stash things beyond footwear.

  • Dimensions: 25.875"H x 24"W x 12"D
  • Material: Powder-coated steel
  • Colors: Black, white, juniper
  • Capacity: Holds up to 6 pairs, supports up to 75 lbs.
  • Carrying handle for easy portability
  • Minimalist style
  • Holds more weight than other styles
  • No edges on the sides, so shoes may slide off when rack is moved

Tangier Boot Tray by Larry Traverso

Tangier Boot Tray by Larry Traverso

Winter is here, and with it comes snow and slush being tracked into the house. With a raised lip to prevent any water or debris from spilling out, a boot tray helps to prevent your entryway or mud room from getting, well, muddy. Reminiscent of tin-tiled ceilings from the late 1800s to early 1900s, the pattern on this metal tray is a step above the boring black rubber options that flood store shelves. Outside of winter, this is a wonderful option for gardening tools, pet accessories, or rain boots.

  • Dimensions: 2"H x 30"W x 13'D'
  • Material: Galvanized iron
  • Colors: Antique copper, turquoise
  • Capacity: Holds up to 3 pairs
  • Raised lip keeps water/snow/slush contained
  • Water resistant
  • Easy to clean
  • Doesn’t hold many pairs

AllModern Seagrass Storage Basket

AllModern Seagrass Storage Basket (Set of 2)

Storage baskets can get typecast as laundry hampers, but their usage is much more utilitarian. These big seagrass beauties provide nearly endless space to toss in shoes, and their included lids keep clutter out of sight. Cutout handles on the side offer portability should you want to swap out your seasonal footwear when the weather changes. We admit storing shoes in a basket may result in some digging around for both sides of a pair, but is a neat way to house a lot of shoes without worrying about running out of space.

  • Dimensions: Small: 23"H x 16"W x 16"D, Large: 24"H x 18"W x 18"D
  • Material: Seagrass, water hyacinth
  • Colors: Dark brown, natural
  • Capacity: Large holds up to 25 pairs, dependent on size
  • Dual purpose as laundry hamper
  • Shoes are completely hidden inside
  • Comes as a matching set
  • No interior organization
  • May trap smells inside

IKEA STÄLL Shoe Cabinet

IKEA STÄLL Shoe Cabinet

Odds are, if you’ve been searching for new shoe storage solutions, you’ve seen this best-selling IKEA shoe cabinet before. Popular in apartments for its narrow footprint and thoughtful tilt-out design, it’s incredibly functional for small spaces. A three-compartment version is also available for slimmer spots. The base unit is great on its own for minimalist decor, but if you want something more customized to your style, there are countless DIY hack TikToks focused on the Ställ to make it your own with new drawer pulls, added tabletops, and more.

  • Dimensions: 35.375"H x 37.75"W x 6.75"D
  • Material: Particleboard, birch wood, plastic edging
  • Colors: White, oak, black
  • Capacity: Holds up to 12 pairs
  • Great for narrow spaces
  • Easy to clean
  • Lengthy assembly process

17 Stories Vertical Shoe Rack

Shoe Rack by 17 Stories

Only have a small amount of space to work with? Explore vertical space with a shoe tower, made to fit even in the narrowest areas. Two larger shelves on the bottom and six smaller upper shelves make room for shoes of all sizes, from heels and sneakers. Tidy up your entryway even further by hanging purses, umbrellas, and keys using the double-tiered hooks on the sides. Mirroring the look of a vertical bookcase, this would be right at home holding your favorite paperbacks, plants, and other knickknacks in addition to your kicks. If you need an even smaller footprint, this compact Yamazaki vertical shoe rack holds five pairs and has a convenient carrying handle similar to the viral Open Spaces rack.

  • Dimensions: 44.5"H x 11"W x 11"D
  • Material: Particleboard
  • Colors: Black, brown, white
  • Capacity: Holds up to eight pairs
  • Great for narrow spaces
  • Can double as a bookshelf
  • Easy to clean
  • More prone to tipping

USM Haller Credenza

USM Haller Credenza

This credenza isn’t technically meant for shoes, but with the sharp design and candy-coated color, we couldn’t help but include it. Architect Fritz Haller’s work inspires USM’s modular furniture, whose chrome-coated frames play right into this years’ design trends. The steel pieces are built to last for generations, making them worth the splurge. The open bottom shelf is tall enough to accommodate even mid-calf height boots, and the two drawers are just as spacious. To achieve the same eye-catching look in a smaller size and lower price point, go for the P2 Bedside Table, which made our list for the best nightstands.

  • Dimensions: 29"H x 60"W x 15" D
  • Materials: Chromed steel frame, powder-coated steel panels
  • Colors: Green, golden yellow, anthracite, beige, black, steel blue, white, gentian blue
  • Capacity: Holds up to 10 pairs, dependent on size
  • Dual purpose as a credenza
  • Tall open storage
  • Durable design
  • Expensive

Urban Outfitters Wall-Mounted Wardrobe

Urban Outfitters Wall-Mounted Wardrobe

A nice pair of shoes are nothing without an outfit to go with them. This rack has a rod for clothing hangers and three shelves for all your shoes and accessories. If you have a small closet, this is a great way to double up on storage space for your wardrobe. The wall-mounted design will keep it secure even as you regularly pull things on and off. An oval door disguises an interior set of shelves, topped off with a full-size mirror to check your look before you leave the house.

  • Dimensions: 68.9"H x 47.48"W x 13.27"D
  • Materials: Wood, metal
  • Colors: Brown
  • Capacity: Holds up to 10 pairs, dependent on utilization
  • Dual purpose as wardrobe
  • Mirror for checking your outfits
  • Wall mounted for stability
  • Pricey
  • Complex assembly

Loll Designs Cubby Bench

Loll Designs Cubby Bench

Need a place to stash your kids’ shoes? This low-profile cubby bench is a handy addition to a mudroom or entryway. Coming in 13 different colors, go with a muted option to blend in with your home decor or a bright one to help get the little ones excited about putting things away. Beyond shoes, the two large slots in the center are large enough to fit tall boots, backpacks, or anything else they might need for school. What’s more, Loll Designs manufactures all its pieces from 100% recycled plastic sheet material, making it waterproof, durable, and easy to clean.

  • Dimensions: 17.25"H x 44"W x 15"D
  • Materials: Recycled high-density polyethylene plastic
  • Colors: Black, chili, driftwood, fog, leaf, navy blue, red, sage, slate, sky blue, sunset orange, white, ash blue
  • Capacity: Holds up to 10 pairs
  • Dual purpose as bench
  • Tall slots to fit large boots
  • Durable construction
  • Pricey

SSWBasics Wire Grid Panel

SSWBasics Wire Grid Panel

Pumps and platforms can be difficult to store with their tall profile, unless you think outside the (shoe) box. Using a metal grid is a shockingly effective alternative storage option to the typical shoe rack. Leaned up against a wall, you can slot heels into the holes of the grid and hang a large number of shoes with ease. Plus the geometric pattern blends effortlessly into many decor styles.

  • Dimensions: 4"H x 2"W
  • Materials: Metal
  • Colors: Black
  • Capacity: Holds up to 20 heels, dependent on size
  • Slots fit a wide array of heel sizes
  • Minimalist design
  • No assembly required
  • Can’t hold non-heeled shoes

The Container Store Drop-Front Shoe Box

Drop-Front Shoe Box By The Container Store

You might not have the idyllic walk-in sneaker closet of Lil Baby (at least yet), but these are a close second for any sneakerheads. Clear fronts let you proudly display all your kicks without having to guess where your favorite pair is. The hinged door on each box allows easy access while keeping shoes protected from dust buildup. They also include ventilation holes to keep funky smells at bay. Endlessly stackable, you can keep adding more in the three available sizes as your shoe collection grows.

  • Dimensions: Small: 6.375"H x 8"W x 12"D; Large: 6.5"H x 10.25"W x 13.625"D; Extra Large: 7.75"H x 11"W x 15"D
  • Materials: Polypropylene, polystyrene
  • Colors: Black, gray, clear
  • Capacity: Holds one pair
  • Stackable
  • High visibility of shoes
  • Great dust protection
  • Have to buy individually

How We Chose These Shoe Racks

From metal shoe racks to stackable bins, our team tried out five top shoe storage options and cataloged their favorites after several weeks of testing. We also rounded up storage benches, shoe storage cabinets, and other organization ideas that are effective for just about every type of shoe. During our review process, we analyzed ease of use, cleanliness, and how different pairs of shoes fit within them. Beyond functionality, we considered how these otherwise innocuous pieces of furniture can visually define an entryway, closet, or living room.
